summary: This bill, the "Support And Value Expectant Moms and Babies Act of 2025" (SAVE Moms and Babies Act of 2025), amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the approval of new abortion drugs and investigational use exemptions for abortion drugs. It also imposes stricter regulatory requirements on previously approved abortion drugs, including limitations on use, dispensing, and reporting requirements for adverse events. The bill defines abortion drugs, adverse events, gestation, and other relevant terms related to the legislation.
